mapper.select: SELECT TEAM_NAME as team_name,FAX as fax,PHONE as phone,ADDRESS as address,TEAM_ID as team_id FROM CAR_TEAM WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAR_TEAM (TEAM_ID, TEAM_NAME, COMPANY, FAX, PHONE, ADDRESS, TEAM_REMARK) VALUES (#{team_id},#{team_name},#{company},#{fax},#{phone},#{address},#{team_remark})
mapper.select: SELECT TEAM_NAME as team_name,FAX as fax,PHONE as phone,ADDRESS as address,TEAM_ID as team_id FROM CAR_TEAM WHERE TEAM_ID=#{ids}
